data.name: Athanasia
data.detailed_description:
Athanasia is a horror FPS where you are Carmen Flores, a researcher and explorer, called to a mysterious facility in South America where reports of local disappearances and strange phenomena have occurred. Explore to uncover a hidden past, all while battling time traveling creatures from prehistory and the future.

EXPLORATION
Environments with multiple paths
Use the level to your advantage

SURVIVAL
Unique enemies from dinosaurs to the bizzare
A large arsenal of weapons and tools

IMMERSION
A story waiting to be uncovered
Detailed retro futuristic visuals

data.short_description: Explore a mysterious facility and use everything you have to survive with an arsenal of equipment as well as your wits against time traveling predators from prehistory and the future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
